title: Is it worth studying in pes  for 12 lakhs for cse

comments.body: The title and the description are so different

isn't it 4 years and I hear 5 lakhs a year for freshers. That's 20 lakhs.   
Including scholarship, it would be lesser yes, so I'm assuming you calculated the 12 lakhs number thinking you'd get scholarship in every semester. 

Is it worth it? nope.   
Do you have another option? it depends on your particular situation. Most Indian universities aren't worth it to be honest. You'd very rarely find motivated teachers who like or even understand what they are teaching and PES is no different.
Bruh it ain't even worth studying here for the JEE fee
I think they were referring to 12 lakh as the annual management quota fee
if its 12 annually, you have about 5%-10% chance to get the package with ctc about half or more than what you are spending on your degree.
Suggest to do engineering at your local place and at the college you can get into. teachers don't matter. How much effort you are willing to put in yourself matters.

Is 12 lakhs a lot of money for u?
Then nah, else pull up
